home.title: Which Chinese City Matches Your Vibe?
home.subtitle: You already decided to visit China. Now pick where to begin. Answer 18 quick questions and get the city that fits your travel personality.

metrics.questions: Quick questions about your travel style
metrics.dimensions: Core dimensions behind the matching model
metrics.cities: Distinctive cities in the recommendation pool

home.desktopPreviewSubtitle: From futuristic skylines to tea-house slow life. Compare the vibe before you commit to a route.
home.shareSubtitle: Your result card is optimized for screenshot posts on TikTok and Instagram.
sharePoints: High-contrast hero card with city identity front and center
Best match plus 2 alternatives in one frame
Best time and budget hints included for quick planning
home.painTitle: The first city choice is the hardest part

painPoints.title: Too many city options
painPoints.description: China has huge regional variety, which makes first-time city selection overwhelming.

painPoints.title: Information overload
painPoints.description: Guides are useful, but too much information makes it harder to decide where to start.

painPoints.title: Need a personal fit
painPoints.description: Most lists rank popularity. Travelers need a city that fits their own pace and interests.

home.modelTitle: A clear system, not a random city list
home.modelSubtitle: We map your answers to a six-dimension profile, then compare it against 15 city profiles and rank the closest matches.
home.modelStep1: Answer 18 scenario-based questions in about 2-3 minutes
home.modelStep2: We calculate your traveler profile across 6 dimensions
home.modelStep3: You get 1 best-match city and 2 runner-up options
home.finalCtaTitle: Ready to find your Chinese city?
home.finalCtaSubtitle: Take the quiz now and turn your China travel idea into a concrete city plan.

footer.title: Your first China city should fit who you are.
footer.subtitle: Take the quiz, lock your first stop, and move from endless research to a real itinerary.
footer.disclaimer: No signup required. Results in about 2-3 minutes.
footer.copyright: Which Chinese City Matches Your Vibe
